lidavidm edited a comment on pull request #12442:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12442#issuecomment-1042347532


   TODOs
   
   - [ ] Split this PR into two parts: one to enable separate transports (ARROW-15282), one to implement a UCX transport
   - [ ] Refactor the Flight tests so that we can run them across multiple transports easily (that is also probably a precursor JIRA)
   - [ ] Refactor the Flight tests so ones that don't touch the transport (e.g. just serializing types) are separate
   - [ ] Finish implementing DoPut/DoExchange
   - [ ] Document the wire protocol here
   - [ ] Document caveats here
   - [ ] Provide benchmark figures


--

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

comments.body: Hi [~lidavidm], I saw you filed some issues about ucx. I have some colleagues working at ucx as core maintainers. Actually, the idea of integrating ucx into flightrpc is from [Pavel Shamis|https://github.com/shamisp] in an internal tech meeting. Ping me if you met with some difficulties in ucx and need help. I think Pavel will be okay to give some support (unfortunately I have little knowledge about ucx).
Thanks for the offer! I actually was introduced to Pavel through a colleague of mine and he has been advising on the approach.
